visualizationConfigs.vQuery: MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.Date as Date , n.Failure as Failure,n.Success as Success ORDER BY Date ASC
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.Date as Date , n.Failure as Failure,n.Success as Success ORDER BY Date ASC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.Date  as Date , n.Failure as Failure,n.Success as Success ORDER BY Date ASC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.Date  as Date , n.Failure as Failure,n.Success as Success ORDER BY Date ASC
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.Developer as Developer, n.Issues as Issues
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.Type as Type, sum(n.Count) as Count
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.Type as Type, sum(n.Count) as Count
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.resultField as Deployment ,n.Deployment as Value
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN n.resultField as Time , n.Time as Value
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)   where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.resultField as Time , n.Time as Value
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.resultField as Time , n.Time as Value
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.resultField as Builds, n.Builds as Value
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.resultField as Time, n.Time as Value
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.resultField as Defects,n.Defects as Value
MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS)  where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.resultField as Stories,n.Stories as Value
